'''Harpastum Bombs Loaded... Blow 'Em Away!''' is part of the [[Midsummer Island Adventure]] [[event]] in [[Version 1.6]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
2021-06-17 4:00 – 2021-06-28 03:59

===Summary===
*During the event, complete "[[The Final Riddle: A Secret Uncovered]]" quest to unlock "Act IV: Harpastum Bombs Loaded... Blow 'Em Away!"
*During the event, Travelers can use the Harpastum Bombs to defeat monsters. Complete the challenge and obtain [[Mini "Harpastum"|Mini "Harpasta"]] to exchange for rewards such as [[Dodoco Tales]] (Catalyst), Furnishing Blueprint "[["Feather-Light Praise"|Feather-Light Praise]]," Furnishing Blueprint "[["The Blue Ocean's Treasure"|The Blue Ocean's Treasure]]," Furnishing Blueprint "[["Witch's Chorus"|Witch's Chorus]]," and [[Weapon Ascension Materials]] from the Event Shop! By completing specified quests, Travelers can also obtain rewards such as [[Primogems]], [[Mora]], and [[Hero's Wit]]!
*{{Item|Straight Shooter|24}}, {{Item|Floaty Splody|24}}, and {{Item|Hot Pod|24}} can be used during the challenges.

==Camp Compositions==
There are six camps in total, with the next one being unlocked after the previous camp is cleared. After the sixth camp, the next is looped back to the first.
*Camp 1: [[Twinning Isle/1.6|Twinning Isle]]{{Enemy List|Hilichurl Fighter*3;Pyro Hilichurl Shooter*2;Hilichurl Berserker*5;Dendro Samachurl;Electro Hilichurl Shooter;Hilichurl Grenadier*2;Anemo Samachurl}}
*Camp 2: [[Twinning Isle/1.6|Twinning Isle]]{{Enemy List|Hilichurl Fighter;Cryo Hilichurl Shooter*4;Hydro Samachurl*2;Hilichurl Fighter*2;Hilichurl Grenadier*3;Hilichurl Berserker*3}}
*Camp 3: [[Broken Isle/1.6|Broken Isle]]{{Enemy List|Large Cryo Slime*2;Ice Shield Hilichurl Guard*5;Ice Shieldwall Mitachurl}}
*Camp 4: [[Minacious Isle/1.6|Minacious Isle]]{{Enemy List|Hydro Samachurl;Large Cryo Slime*2;Ice Shieldwall Mitachurl;Ice Shield Hilichurl Guard*2}}
*Camp 5: [[Pudding Isle/1.6|Pudding Isle]]{{Enemy List|Stonehide Lawachurl;Anemo Samachurl;Geo Samachurl}}
*Camp 6: [[Pudding Isle/1.6|Pudding Isle]]{{Enemy List|Frostarm Lawachurl;Cryo Hilichurl Shooter*2}}

==Notes==
* Harpastum Bombs appear to deal a set amount of damage to enemies depending on [[World Level]] and cannot score a critical hit.
* Enemies in the challenge appear to take a significant damage reduction to attacks that do not involve throwing Harpastum Bombs.
